Test.Name: Current network interface is not on DHCP (one network interface)
Test.Description: !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! First of all press 'Check' on the Discovery tab to set initial authentification level !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: STEP 11 - Checking network settings DHCP for network interface with token '1' is not turned on STEP FAILED

Test.Description: !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! First of all press 'Check' on the Discovery tab to set initial authentification level !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: STEP 10 - Get network interfaces Transmit done Receive done Access denied (HTTP status 401 received) STEP FAILED
